title: Twilio prototype
tagline: This dashboard shows data collected via SMS messages. It was created by Alex as a Performance Platform Christmas project at the end of 2013.

modules.title: Number of messages by sender
modules.description: The number of SMS messages each number sent

modules.title: Mean numbers over time
modules.description: The mean value per day of numbers sent via SMS
info: Shows the mean value of the numbers sent via SMS to the Performance Platform
